channel.title: Dungeoneering Development | Dubscape
channel.description:
[b]This is what I've been doing for the past week. Coding Dung and ignoring my gf, It was worth it. ;)[/b]
Before you read on; [size=18pt]Criticism [/size] is GOOD! [size=18pt]Trolling[/size] is NOT!
So you might be thinking, Big Whoop you made dungeoneering? Its not like plenty of other servers dont already have it. CORRECT! They do! But.. there most all shitty. First of all since when was duneoneering spawning in a room with manta ray killing the same monster 10 times to find a key then you go onto the boss?
NO! First of all you pick the keys up off the ground! Second Its one huge fucking puzzle/maze! Third you must kill the ncps to advance to the next room not directly go to the boss!
[b][size=14pt]AND LASTLY! No other server's dung has customizble exp! Yes no 2 people with get the same it all depends on what they do!! How much they eat, if they find a chest, how many npcs they kill, how much they participated in the group! WAIT GROUP? Yes, im 25% finished with making dung Multiplayer, with groups of 4.[/size][/b]
[b]Media:[/b] I recorded a video last night with and its on a shitty laptop so no voice and crappy quality. Well here it is:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOZl6g6HwxM[/youtube]
And most importantly why is this the best dung ever coded? Well it was all coded on a notebook. Dunno what a notebook is? Only THE shittiest laptop ever created.
So want to help me out? Or make a team?
App: [code] Name: Age: GFX/Interfaces/Coding(Client/Server): Proof of Skills/Work: AIM/SKYPE/MSN: [/code]
[b][size=12pt]I really need interface experts to help code the 'You Completed A Dungeon' ALSO I NEED SUGGESTIONS FOR PLACES TO MAKE FLOORS![/size][/b]
Thanks for looking at my thread. Criticism, Suggestions, Others are appreciated :)

cords?[/quote]I don’t know >.< lol but I know there’s a ton of areas under there cause I’ve been down there before.

item.title: Dungeoneering Development | Dubscape
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:10, topic:414939”][quote author=eballer48 link=topic=516901.msg3754133#msg3754133 date=1316291276]

[quote author=runewings317 link=topic=516901.msg3754100#msg3754100 date=1316289469]

You should make the system different. But good job. Hope you improve!

How so?
[/quote]Make it almost like Jad, so that the monsters don’t re-spawn, ya know?

I tried but don’t know how, help? Ill ++rep and be your Bitch.
[/quote]Uhhh… Just find all the Jad code, Copy and Paste it and edit it to dungeoneering. You might want to make like 4 Strings:

String partyowner = null; String member1 = null; String member2 = null; String member3 = null;
and make it so when you add someone to the party it will replace the null with the player name. That would also be a cool idea. :P[/quote]

Didnt wanna say anything buuuuut ive already started working on the dung interface ;D
Not a stupid BS one like other servs but real on like rs!

You seem like a real cool dude and like you know wtf your talking about, would u like to help me develop diss?

@Jad thing
Fuck, idk i was doing some searching in npchandler, client, etc…
This might be a tiny bit hard.

Read full topic
